items.headline: Another Kroger earnings beat shows the eat-at-home trend is set to continue
items.summary_en: Kroger’s stock was rallying Thursday after another earnings beat and a raised outlook.

items.headline: First-time unemployment claims surge to 263,000 — the highest level in nearly four years
items.summary_en: The labor market has slowed markedly this summer, as businesses have stopped hiring due to uncertainty over the cost and impact of tariffs on imported goods.

items.headline: Opendoor’s stock soars again as leadership changes hailed as ‘incredible outcome’ for shareholders

items.headline: Nomura bets on the dollar against the pound as U.K. fiscal predicament grabs spotlight

items.headline: ‘My income is not enough’: I’m a single parent in my early 50s. Should I add my kids, 23 and 29, to my mortgage application?

items.headline: Apple’s stock is stuck in a rut. Why this bull just threw in the towel.
items.summary_en: D.A. Davidson says Apple “was either caught off-guard by AI or is genuinely facing innovator’s dilemma and cannot innovate.” Either way, it’s a problem for the stock.

items.headline: ‘Fun came before paying bills’: My brother-in-law is in his 70s and homeless. Are we responsible for him?
